column2: truly. The impressionist gallery was beautiful. The contemporary galleries were amazing. I feel like I only saw half of what I wanted but hey its ok. Lovely layout. Could use some dusting tho! what is going on with the cleaning crew ppl? All dust bunnies under those benches. Beautiful flow
column3: lovely light and works on display were great. The kids enjoyed it as did everybody else. Awesome that kids 13 and under are free
